entities.name: BusinessUnit
entities.description: Business, division, or department in the Microsoft Dynamics 365 database.

attributes.name: businessUnitId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit.

attributes.name: organizationId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the business unit.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the business unit.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the business unit.

attributes.name: divisionName
attributes.description: Name of the division to which the business unit belongs.

attributes.name: fileAsName
attributes.description: Alternative name under which the business unit can be filed.

attributes.name: tickerSymbol
attributes.description: Stock exchange ticker symbol for the business unit.

attributes.name: stockExchange
attributes.description: Stock exchange on which the business is listed.

attributes.name: UTCOffset
attributes.description: UTC offset for the business unit. This is the difference between local time and standard Coordinated Universal Time.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the business unit was created.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the business unit was last modified.

attributes.name: creditLimit
attributes.description: Credit limit for the business unit.

attributes.name: costCenter
attributes.description: Name of the business unit cost center.

attributes.name: webSiteUrl
attributes.description: Website URL for the business unit.

attributes.name: ftpSiteUrl
attributes.description: FTP site URL for the business unit.

attributes.name: emailAddress
attributes.description: Email address for the business unit.

attributes.name: inheritanceMask
attributes.description: Inheritance mask for the business unit.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the business unit.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the business unit.

attributes.name: workflowSuspended
attributes.description: Information about whether workflow or sales process rules have been suspended.

attributes.name: parentBusinessUnitId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the parent business unit.

attributes.name: isDisabled
attributes.description: Information about whether the business unit is enabled or disabled.

attributes.name: disabledReason
attributes.description: Reason for disabling the business unit.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version number of the business unit.

attributes.name: address1AddressId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for address 1.

attributes.name: address1AddressTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of address for address 1, such as billing, shipping, or primary address.

attributes.name: address1Name
attributes.description: Name to enter for address 1.

attributes.name: address1Line1
attributes.description: First line for entering address 1 information.

attributes.name: address1Line2
attributes.description: Second line for entering address 1 information.

attributes.name: address1Line3
attributes.description: Third line for entering address 1 information.

attributes.name: address1City
attributes.description: City name for address 1.

attributes.name: address1StateOrProvince
attributes.description: State or province for address 1.

attributes.name: address1County
attributes.description: County name for address 1.

attributes.name: address1Country
attributes.description: Country/region name for address 1.

attributes.name: address1PostOfficeBox
attributes.description: Post office box number for address 1.

attributes.name: address1PostalCode
attributes.description: ZIP Code or postal code for address 1.

attributes.name: address1UTCOffset
attributes.description: UTC offset for address 1. This is the difference between local time and standard Coordinated Universal Time.

attributes.name: address1UPSZone
attributes.description: United Parcel Service (UPS) zone for address 1.

attributes.name: address1Latitude
attributes.description: Latitude for address 1.

attributes.name: address1Telephone1
attributes.description: First telephone number associated with address 1.

attributes.name: address1Longitude
attributes.description: Longitude for address 1.

attributes.name: address1ShippingMethodCode
attributes.description: Method of shipment for address 1.

attributes.name: address1Telephone2
attributes.description: Second telephone number associated with address 1.

attributes.name: address1Telephone3
attributes.description: Third telephone number associated with address 1.

attributes.name: address1Fax
attributes.description: Fax number for address 1.

attributes.name: address2AddressId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for address 2.

attributes.name: address2AddressTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of address for address 2, such as billing, shipping, or primary address.

attributes.name: address2Name
attributes.description: Name to enter for address 2.

attributes.name: address2Line1
attributes.description: First line for entering address 2 information.

attributes.name: address2Line2
attributes.description: Second line for entering address 2 information.

attributes.name: address2Line3
attributes.description: Third line for entering address 2 information.

attributes.name: address2City
attributes.description: City name for address 2.

attributes.name: address2StateOrProvince
attributes.description: State or province for address 2.

attributes.name: address2County
attributes.description: County name for address 2.

attributes.name: address2Country
attributes.description: Country/region name for address 2.

attributes.name: address2PostOfficeBox
attributes.description: Post office box number for address 2.

attributes.name: address2PostalCode
attributes.description: ZIP Code or postal code for address 2.

attributes.name: address2UTCOffset
attributes.description: UTC offset for address 2. This is the difference between local time and standard Coordinated Universal Time.

attributes.name: address2UPSZone
attributes.description: United Parcel Service (UPS) zone for address 2.

attributes.name: address2Latitude
attributes.description: Latitude for address 2.

attributes.name: address2Telephone1
attributes.description: First telephone number associated with address 2.

attributes.name: address2Longitude
attributes.description: Longitude for address 2.

attributes.name: address2ShippingMethodCode
attributes.description: Method of shipment for address 2.

attributes.name: address2Telephone2
attributes.description: Second telephone number associated with address 2.

attributes.name: address2Telephone3
attributes.description: Third telephone number associated with address 2.

attributes.name: address2Fax
attributes.description: Fax number for address 2.

attributes.name: picture
attributes.description: Picture or diagram of the business unit.

attributes.name: calendarId
attributes.description: Fiscal calendar associated with the business unit.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the businessunit.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the businessunit.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the businessunit.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the businessunit with respect to the base currency.
